movies.description: Pushpa: The Rule is a sequel of the Internationally acclaimed film Pushpa: The Rise, which has set the fans on the edge of their seats for its release. It follows the life of its daring protagonist Pushpa Raj as played by Allu Arjun who is a smuggler by profession in the film....

Sikandar Ka Muqaddar is a 2024 Indian Hindi-language film directed by Neeraj Pandey. The plot revolves around a cop who is mad about solving one of the robbery cases which remained unsolved. As the probe progresses ...

movies.cast: Abhisekh Bachchan, Ahilya Bamroo, Jayant Kriplani
movies.description: I Want to Talk is one of those relevant films that are intense, moving and meaningful directed by Shoojit Sircar. The cast features Indian actor Abhishek Bachchan in the central character's role who struggles with ...

movies.cast: Ajay Devgn, Bhoomika Chawla, Sameeera Reddy
movies.description: Naam is a thriller film surrounding the character Ajay Devgn which is Released in November 2024. The plot centres around an assassin who suffers memory loss after an accident. In the process of trying to regain his ...

movies.cast: Bhuvan Arora, Gaurav Venkatesh, Geetha Kailasam
movies.description: Amaran is an Indian Hindi-language war action film directed by Kamal Haasan which centers around Major Mukund Varadarajan.It traces the history of Major Varadarajan, who died during a terrorist operation in Kashmir. ...

movies.cast: Adil Hussain, Gulshan Devaiah, Janhvi Kapoor
movies.description: Ulajh (transl. Entangle) is a 2024 Indian Hindi Language spy thriller film directed by Sudhanshu Saria and produced by Junglee Pictures. The cast includes Janhvi Kapoor, Gulshan Devaiah, Roshan Mathew and Adil Hussain. It revolves around a young IFS officer having a family background of patriots who gets involved in perilous personal intrigue, during a professional posting that is a turning point in her career, but far from her country.

Kalki 2898 AD is one of the most awaited Bollywood sci-fi films directed by Nag Ashwin. The story is set in the year 2898, where a band of rebels seeks to overthrow a totalitarian regime. In terms of the plot, the film is different from any other Indian film as it features renowned personalities like Prabhas, Deepika Padukone, Amitabh Bachchan, and Kamal Haasan.

Stree 2 is the horror comedy-drama film on the director Amar Kaushik which is released in India. This is a follow-up to the ’Stree’ movie which was released in the year 2018. The cast includes Rajkummar Rao, Shraddha Kapoor, Pankaj Tripathi, Aparshakti Khurana, and others, all of whom were there in the Stree movie as well.

movies.cast: Ahmed Ibn Umar, Aman Rajput, Anil Kapoor
movies.description: Animal is a Bollywood action thriller film directed by Sandeep Reddy Vanga. The film stars Ranbir Kapoor, Parineeti Chopra, Anil Kapoor, and Bobby Deol in the lead roles. The film is produced by Bhushan Kumar, Krishan Kumar, Murad Khetani, and Sandeep Reddy Vanga under the banner of T-Series and Cine1 Studios.

movies.directorName: Artemii Abramov, Evgeny Dostal, Franz Spilhaus
movies.cast: Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif, Hrithik Roshan
movies.description: Tiger 3 is an Indian action thriller film which will be released soon focusing primarily on the life of RAW agent Tiger, played by Salman Khan. It lies third in the order of Tiger film series followed by the blockbusters Ek Tha Tiger and Tiger Zinda Hai.

movies.cast: Kartik Aryan, Tripti Dimri, Rajpal Yadav
movies.description: Anees Bazmee directed the Hindi horror-comedy film Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3. Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 is an Indian film which is the third part of the Bhool Bhulaiyaa series after the superhit Bhool Bhulaiyaa released in 2007 and Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2 launched in 2022.

movies.cast: Aileen Wu, Archee Renaux, Cailee Spaeny
movies.description: Alien: Romulus is  released in the year 2024 in Hindi, it is directed by Fede Álvarez and falls into the genre of sci-fi horror films. A group of young space settlers searching a found-abandoned space station & it’s airspace finds themselves facing a frighteningly powerful alien creature.

movies.movieName: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
movies.cast: Freya Allan, Kevin Durand, Owen Teague
movies.description: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes is a new American science fiction film, directed by Wes Ball. It is the continuation of the War for the Planet of the Apes, released in 2017, and the fifth film of the series made in order to reboot the Planet of the Apes. The action of the movie takes place a number of years after the War for the Planet of the Apes and centers on Caesar who is the chief of the apes’ community and works on suppressing a new human menace to his kind.
